courses.title: Cybersecurity for Beginners
courses.short_description: A foundational course on the principles of cybersecurity.
courses.long_description: This comprehensive course introduces you to the fundamental concepts of cybersecurity. You'll learn about common threats, basic security practices, and how to protect yourself and organizations from cyber attacks.

courses.title: Web App Penetration Testing
courses.short_description: Discover vulnerabilities in web applications like SQLi, XSS, and CSRF.
courses.long_description: Master the art of finding and exploiting web application vulnerabilities. This course covers SQL injection, cross-site scripting, cross-site request forgery, and other common web security issues.

courses.title: Network Security Fundamentals
courses.short_description: Understand the principles of network security and common protocols.
courses.long_description: Dive deep into network security concepts including firewalls, intrusion detection systems, VPNs, and secure network architectures. Learn how to protect networks from various threats.

courses.title: Introduction to Ethical Hacking
courses.short_description: Learn the basics of ethical hacking and penetration testing.
courses.long_description: Become an ethical hacker and learn to think like an attacker. This course covers reconnaissance, scanning, exploitation, and reporting in a legal and ethical manner.

courses.title: Linux Fundamental
courses.short_description: Linux fundamentals focus on the basic understanding of the Linux operating system, its file system, permissions, and essential commands used to manage files and processes efficiently.
courses.long_description: Linux fundamentals cover the basic concepts and commands of the Linux operating system, including its open-source nature, file system structure, user and permission management, and command-line operations. Understanding Linux fundamentals helps users navigate the system efficiently, manage files and processes, and perform essential administrative tasks, forming a strong foundation for system administration and software development.
